description: A simple commandline to serve on-demand files thru a builtin http server. Just give files you want to serve to yserv, and it will act as an http server, letting people download your files during a session.
longdescription: A simple commandline to serve on-demand files thru a builtin http server. Just give files you want to serve to yserv, and it will act as an http server, letting people download your files during a session.
